body_html:
Hi @AnkitaKhurana 👋

I'm sorry, but I fear I don't really understand the issue here 🙈

What is the problem with the URL in your opinion? The link exposes the activities as an RSS feed in the atom xml format for feeds. I would not know how this should be done any different - afaik it's the default process as e.g. news sites use it as well.

Depending on your browser, Firefox for instance, you can directly subscribe to the feed from this url:

Therefore I'd close this here. Feel free to reopen in case I got you totally wrong and am overseeing an actual problem of the app 🙈

body: Hi @AnkitaKhurana 👋 I'm sorry, but I fear I don't really understand the issue here 🙈 What is the problem with the URL in your opinion? The link exposes the activities as an RSS feed in the [atom](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atom_(Web_standard)) xml format for feeds. I would not know how this should be done any different - afaik it's the default process as e.g. news sites use it as well. Depending on your browser, Firefox for instance, you can directly subscribe to the feed from this url: Therefore I'd close this here. Feel free to reopen in case I got you totally wrong and am overseeing an actual problem of the app 🙈
